progetto.network.localconnection

Class LocalConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.localconnection.LocalConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INetworkHandler

    public final class LocalConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements INetworkHandler
    An implementation of INetworkHandler that does not go through the network. Calls are blocking, calls are not synchronized.
    Author:
    Massimo

      • sendMessage

        Description copied from interface: INetworkHandler
